description: Table containing Secure Chat conversation participants.

columns.name: CONVERSATION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the secure chat conversation record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of a user participating in the conversation.

columns.name: USER_MYPT_ID
columns.description: The patient access account ID of a patient or proxy in the conversation.

columns.name: USER_ACTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This indicates if the participant is considered active in the conversation or not


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: LST_READ_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The time the participant last read a message in the conversation. The time is used to generate read receipts whenever a user opens up the conversation.

columns.name: UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: This indicates the time of the last update that the user would be concerned with.

columns.name: LST_READ_MSG_LN
columns.description: The line number of the message last read by the participant.

columns.name: LST_READ_MSG_DAT
columns.description: The DAT of the message last read by the participant.

columns.name: READ_ALL_MSG_YN
columns.description:
Flag needed to index conversations with new messages.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: ADDED_FROM_GROUP_YN
columns.description:
Item used to determine whether or not a user was included in the conversation part of a group instead of being added normally.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: UNREAD_MESSAGE_CNT
columns.description: The number of unread messages in the conversation for this user. Used to cache unread message counts.

columns.name: LAST_IMPORTANT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item stores the last unread important message instant; when a message with a higher than normal priority is sent we set this to the time that the message was sent.

columns.name: USER_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the priority of the message to display for the user in the Secure Chat conversation list.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Unspecified


Normal


Important


Urgent

columns.name: LST_REACTION_LN
columns.description: Line (of TLK 3500 superitem) of last reaction a user has received for one of their messages.

columns.name: LST_REACT_CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: DAT of last reaction a user has received for one of their messages.

columns.name: LST_REACTION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of last reaction a user has received for one of their messages.

columns.name: LATEST_REACTION_SEEN_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Instant of latest reaction (by anyone to any message) seen by user

columns.name: SHOW_IN_UNREAD_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether this conversation should count towards the user in this row of superitem 2000's unread counts.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: READ_ALL_MSG_YN
